error.USERNAME_NOT_UNIQUE: This user name is already in use
error.LOGIN_UNKNOWN: This login isn't associated with any accounts - if you already have an account, then login with username/email and password. Or you can register a new account.
error.PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_IN_USE: This profile is already connected to another account
error.EMAIL_IN_USE: The email is already in use

profile.passwordsNotIdentical: The two passwords are not identical
profile.invalidLinkMessage: Links in emails must be used within 30 minutes and only work once.
profile.accountConfirmed: Your account has been confirmed and you are now logged in
profile.unknownUser: Unable to log in. Unknown user or password.
profile.signInAgreement: By signing in you accept GBIFs [terms](/terms) and [privacy policy](/terms/privacy-policy).
profile.invalidUsername: A valid username is 3-64 characters and only contains letters a-z (lowercase) and ._-
profile.passwordLength: Password must be 6 characters or more
profile.passwordMaxLength: You password may not be above 256 characters
profile.selectAllImages: Select all images below like this one
profile.tryAgainLater: We couldn't reset you password right now - please try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience
profile.criticalFailure: Hmm - this isn't good. Please try to refresh. If the problem persists, then please let us know.
profile.verficationLinkSent: You have been sent an email with a verification link to ensure it is your mail. Welcome to GBIF
profile.resetPasswordMessage: We have sent you a mail with a link to reset your password.
